content: TAN Ah Hwee | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS TAN Ah Hwee Full-time Faculty Lee Kong Chian Professor of Computer Science; Associate Dean (Research) Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, Boston University, 1994 Teaching Topics Machine Learning Programming Statistical Thinking Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to GENG Minghong Cassandra TAN Hui Ming +65 68280022 ahtan@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceMachine Learning & IntelligenceLearning & WorkTechnology-Enhanced Learning & PedagogyAnalytics & Decision SupportHealth & WellbeingAgeing & Mental HealthBiomedical Informatics Strategic Priorities Sustainable Living
